TextBlock.Text: PROTEA: In preperation for the Silverflame system's death, everything we have writen on the surrounding planets will be moved to this computer.

BEGONIA: I'm unsure if this computer is the best place to store our <color=orange>Exploration Logs</color>. Should there be an error with <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>, the computer wouldn't allow us to access our logs until repairs are made.
PROTEA: This is our best option. We only have 5 days to leave this system, and it would take too long to physicaly move anything written on walls to <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color>.
